## Privacy & Safety Checklist

Before submitting, confirm your feature request:

- [ ] Does NOT require collecting individual recipient data
- [ ] Operates at the group level (not individual level)
- [ ] Does NOT expand data retention or collection
- [ ] Aligns with the project's privacy-first principles
